author: Michelle R. Smith, Marina Villenueve
title: Competition for supplies sharpening as pandemic worsens
description: NEW YORK (AP) — Scarce supplies of medical equipment are leading to growing competition within the U.S. and among nations, in what one French politician called a "worldwide treasure hunt."...
content:
NEW YORK (AP) Scarce supplies of medical equipment are leading to growing competition within the U.S. and among nations, in what one French politician called a worldwide treasure hunt.
